overview: A CEO with over 20 years experience of launching technologies. Working alongside many of IT’s industry luminaries, Sean helped take his first company, Computer Associates, beyond $1billion in European revenues, whilst being personally responsible for many of the company’s largest financial transactions. In 2000 he started the European operation of Managed Objects, a business service management company. He was responsible for double-digit year on year growth and helped steer the company to a successful sale with Novell Inc. In addition to his role at broolz, Sean also sits on the Board of two other companies and is an advisor to a third.
